page.title: 13THE SPORTS CENTRE
page.content: The sports centre opens at 10.00am and finishes at 10.00pm.They have 6 full_timers and 11 part_timers,the people there are the: Manager Deputy Manager Duty Officers 3 part time receptionists secretary and the caretaker The swimming pool is filled with 176,000 gallons of water,it takes 1\ days to empty the pool and 3 days to fill the pool again. The sports centre has 2 swimming pools,10 badminton courts,2 solariums 2 five_a_side football pitches,a sauna a weight training room,golf,cricket, hockey,bowls,squash,aerobics,Judo and Karate. The busiest days are Sunday,Tuesday and Thursday.
